Documentation: Will you use additional documentation, e.g. standard questionnaires, codebooks, notebooks etc, which fieldwork metadata do you collect, does this follow a standard? For more information see: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Storage: Storing data on laptops is not very secure, please consult the storage guide for alternatives: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: upon deposit RDR will add a DOI to your datasets
